comment: I took PSYC 2500 online. The professor was nice and offered helpful extra credit. I enjoyed the material and assignments, but the exams were very difficult despite thorough studying. I also feel the exams counted for too much of the grade.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: I took Psych 2500 and overall it is a hard class period but enjoyed the professor and she is a VERY KIND grader!!! There were 2 extra credits that helped bump my grade. If you have to take Psych 2500 I would 100% take her!! The hardest part of this class if just the content and it is ALOT of information.

As long as you read the textbook and study from it for the exams, you are solid(I didn't see any of her lectures).

She does assign weekly textbook questions  along with a quiz (multiple retries). Take that as an advantage to practice your understanding of the topic's concept. 
The exams are lockdown w/webcam.

-A few discussions posts
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Swallow made psychology very enjoyable! Her lectures can be fun and she allows for extra credit through SI session attendance. There's textbook work due every week (shouldn't take long), in-person assignments (discussion posts), and online work every Friday. Overall, great class and great professor.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: Her class was pretty self explanatory. Every week we had 5-6 homework modules to complete. Every few weeks we would have a discussion post. There are 4 tests including the final. You are guaranteed an A if you study for the tests and clearly follow the discussion board criteria.

Took her online PYSC 1101 class. She drops lots of grades at the end so if you have a mess up or two it won't hurt your overall grade. If you do bad on an assignment she will leave a comment telling you why so you can fix it in the future. Lots of reading from the text book and achieve assignments. Tests are on lockdown browser with webcam.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Gives good feedback

comment: I took Dr. Swallow's PSYC 1101 class. She is amazing and funny. The textbook is online and there are only 3 tests: no final. Homework is easy, just make sure you read the textbook because her tests mostly contain stuff from the textbook not just from the PowerPoint. She does small index card activities to count for attendance.

She is very involved with her students, and it is a pretty easy class as long as you do the work. The only thing is that she moves pretty fast on the slideshows, although she does post them to D2L so you can look at it and review. The tests are easy, just be present. She even posts what all is on the test, and it is extremely helpful.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: This class is graded on discussion posts with responses and you have to use in-text citations from one of the THREE books we have to buy ourselves. Tests are open note but timed and two HUGE papers one of them being 8-10 pages. This class has a huge workload so don't take her if you have a bigger schedule. She also is not clear on what she wants.

The best professor to take for SOCI 3380.There are 3 exams which are open book and 3 writing assignments. There are also discussions but mostly done in class! This class is an easy A and professor Swallow is amazing! Highly recommend
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Swallow was great! She is super understanding and helpful when it comes to material. The SOCI 3380 was paper heavy, so be prepared to read and write A LOT! Great semester!

Best teacher ever, she loves communication.She does require you to read 3 books and write papers on them, and 1 final paper.I took her in person and we did all small assignments in class which guaranteed us a 100, and took off the stress of doing those so we could focus on the papers.I love that lady, and I would stick her in my pocket if I could.

Not a terrible teacher, just required SO MUCH READING and busy work. I think she probably makes a better in-person teacher than an online one. Had to do 4 big papers throughout the course. The first 3 weren't bad, but the last one was a very long project and a lot of work.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: Professor Swallow is one of the best professors I have taken. Her class is so easy, but very engaging. It makes you think about our society. She is so caring and understanding!

Shes great!! There were 3 quizzes, one midterm exam, and the final. You also have to write a 300 word APA format journal every week, which was super easy! Prof. Swallow was absolutely amazing and understanding. I love her and I highly recommend her! Attendance was mandatory but you have 2 free passes. Textbook is optional. I used an older edition.

Mona is a wonderful professor. She cares and looks out for her students. She will push back assignments if needed and responds fast to emails. Overall there is no complaints and the class itself was very informal. Btw exams are found on quizlet and if you cant find them there then you'll find the answers on the textbook that she assigned.

Dr. Swallow's Race and Ethnicity class was poignant, important and very noteworthy for today! The class covered a great deal of material and it was very eye-opening to truly delve into the racial climates of our modern world. The class was also rather difficult at times, and the four assignments were very extensive. Stay on top of your work!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Graded by few things--Amazing lectures

comment: Professor Swallow is so passionate about Sociology and it really shows. She is very respectful and is considerate of ones opinions and feelings. Attendance is mandatory but you get two free days to be absent and the assignments are stress free you just have to be attentive to the lectures to understand also quizzes every week but they are so easy.

TAKE HER. She is amazing, most classes you just discuss a certain topic and she makes it really engaging. You have a quiz and 300 word journal every week and I was honestly scared on the first day because I thought it was a lot of work but it was so easy once you actually started. She is SO understanding and cares so much for her students.

Passionate about sociology. Provides a safe & comfortable space for everyone. She likes to have discussions that pertain to her lectures. I'm halfway through her class & I still have an A. Not much grading. There are reflection journals & a quiz every week but it's super easy. If you missed it, just email her. Very understanding/caring. Take her!!

Professor Swallow is such a chill teacher, and she really cares about students' opinions and making sure people are comfortable pertaining to certain topics. The class is straightforward. Just have to do weekly responses along with weekly quizzes, but they are easy. Follow the rubric for the journal responses, and the class will be easy.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria--Hilarious

comment: I'm only halfway through her class, but I have really enjoyed it. You can tell she is passionate about what she teaches, and she provides a safe space for opinions. She is very understanding and wants you to succeed. We have lectures during class and there's a quiz and a journal every week but it's easy if you pay attention. Definitely recommend!
